text: Simhaasanam is a 1979 Indian Malayalam-language film, directed by Sreekumaran Thampi, starring Madhu and Lakshmi in the lead roles. == Cast == * Madhu as Gopalan, Ramu (double role) * Lakshmi as Narayani * Nanditha Bose as Savithri * Sukumari as Kurup's wife * Jagathy Sreekumar as Bhramadathan Potti * Balan K. Nair as Medayil Padmanabhan Kurup * Janardanan as Vijaya Kumar * Kanakadurga as Madhavi * Kuthiravattam Pappu as Cheriyan * P. K. Venukkuttan Nair as Padmanabhan * Poojappura Ravi as Kumaran * Vallathol Unnikrishnan as Krishnan Thampi *Priyamvada as Rajani *Sasi as Rajani's lover *Master Rajakumaran Thampi as Young Ramu ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by M.
